actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 18 of the United States Code to prohibit corporate bribes of foreign officials.

summary.text: Prohibits corporate bribery of foreign officials, subjecting violating corporations to a fine of not less than $500,000 nor more than $25,000,000. Subjects corporate officers, employees, or agents who bribe such officials to a fine of not less than $10,000 nor more than $25,000, or imprisonment for not less than one nor more than ten years, or both. Defines "domestic corporation", "foreign official", and "official act" for purposes of this Act. (Adds 18 U.S.C. 225)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 18 of the United States Code to prohibit corporate bribes of foreign officials.
